jcr:content.jcr:description: Definisse™ 3D lift threads are the latest technique for facial rejuvenation. They are designed to sculpt beautifully soft contours, prominent cheekbones, and youthful jawlines.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Definisse™ 3D lift threads

title_copy_copy.jcr:title: Lift, reshape and stimulate volume with Definisse™ 3D lift threads, a non-surgical rejuvenating treatment for your facial contours.

text.text:
As we age we may be frustrated by changes in our skin quality and facial contours - due to a combination of factors such as genetics, lifestyle, and environmental influences.

Definisse™ 3D lift threads are the latest technique for facial rejuvenation.They are designed to sculpt beautifully soft contours, prominent cheekbones, and youthful jawlines. Our threads treatments are quick and minimally invasive, repositioning volume and adding definition where it matters most.

Discover the secret to a rejuvenated appearance with Definisse™ 3D lift threads - you’ll wish you discovered them years ago.

text_copy_copy.text: The fastest growing aesthetic medicine procedure in the last 5 years, suspension threads are one of the latest non-surgical anti-aging treatments for minor facial sagging. Popularity is growing fast as more people discover the ease with which they can enjoy a natural looking timelessness.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What are Definisse™ 3D lift threads good for?

title.jcr:title: A 3 dimensional solution to the 3-dimensional aging process

text_copy_copy.text:
1. Wrinkles and fine Lines: a first sign of aging due to loss of elasticity and a decrease in collagen. Definisse™ 3D lift threads tighten skin and stimulate collagen production to erase wrinkles and fine lines.

  2. Loss of volume: a hollowed-out appearance can occur due to loss of fat, muscle mass and also bone reabsorption. Our threads reposition tissue to fill out hollowed areas.

  3. Change in facial contours: less defined facial contours (for example in the jawline) due to thinning skin, weaker facial muscles and ligaments which give the skin a sagging appearance. Definisse™ 3D lift threads lift and reshape creating younger looking contours.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is a Definisse™ 3D lift threads treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text: This procedure is super simple. The minimally invasive technique is relatively painless, quick, taking just 15-20 minutes. You will see immediate results and also enjoy the long-term effect of the thread stimulating collagen production over time. Because it’s non-surgical the treatment doesn't disrupt your life with long recovery times and visible scarring.

item_1723188303459.cq:panelTitle: How do Definisse™ 3D lift threads work?

text_copy_copy.text:
The treatment works by inserting high-quality, dissolvable threads (just like surgical sutures) under the skin with a fine needle.  The threads are gently pulled to reposition the tissue to your desired shape. The skin grips the thread and keeps it in place, thread ends are then cut neatly to sit invisibly below the skin.

The presence of the thread stimulates collagen production which enhances the lifting effect as well as improving skin density, elasticity and firmness. This continues as the threads dissolve generating still more collagen, meaning that results can last up to 18 months1

text_copy.text:
We use the very latest technology, proven efficacy and safety, perfected through rigorous clinical trials and tests –and perhaps, best of all, Definisse™ results are consistent and reliable. Our RELIFE Academy ensures all Definisse™ practitioners are optimally trained in the best and proven techniques, developed together with world leading aesthetics professionals.

Definisse™ 3D lift threads are made of our high performance P(LA-CL) material and structured in a unique way that makes them more flexible and adaptable than other threads5 , so reshaping capabilities are superior. They are also transparent - so sit hidden under the skin. Results last up to 18 months1, and fewer are needed, assuring you of excellent value for your treatment spend. You will also enjoy the long-term generation of both Collagen Type 1 and 31,3 for that confident glow.

teaser_813012125.jcr:title: Definisse™ Boca Threads

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: What is a threads lift treatment?

text_copy_copy.text: A threads lift is a non surgical, minimally invasive aesthetics procedure that can reposition facial tissue to reshape, volumise and perfect the contours of your face, regaining and maintaining youthful features.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: How do I get rid of marionette lines?

text_copy_copy.text: A Definisse™ 3D lift threads treatment applied to the jawline elevates jowling and can soften the lines at the sides of our mouths known as marionette lines.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: How long does a threads lift last?

text_copy_copy.text: Most thread lifts last from 6 to 12 months. A Definisse™ 3D lift threads lift can last up to 18 months1

title_1657927442.jcr:title: Definisse™3D lift threads can be combined with other Definisse™ products, to achieve the best possible results in holistic rejuvenation, for optimal well being.

title.jcr:title: Be ready for every event in life

text.text:
Enjoy the confidence of alluring defined cheeks and elegant poise by combining both lifting and volumising techniques. Working together to deliver a seamless and natural result; Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads give your cheeks support by repositioning skin that has begun to sag with gravity, whilst Definisse™ Filler restores hydration, density and volume to the cheekbone area, replacing volume that has diminished overtime. 

The result is a refreshed demeanor, defined features and a younger outlook.

text_copy_copy.text:
LIFT THE WEIGHT OF TIME

 

Hold your head up high with a taught, crisp jawline - eliminating jowling and sagging skin.

You might have thought that was a thing of the past, but with Definisse™ Eleva, it can be possible again. 

The upper jaw area is redefined and volumised with strategic placement of Definisse™ Fillers. Then Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads lift the weight of time from your jawline to reinstate a youthful contour and silhouette. Taking years off & renewing your sense of self.

item_1723189871133.cq:panelTitle: DEFINISSE™ ILLUMINA Eyebrow lift & dark circles

title_copy_copy.jcr:title: DEFINISSE™ ILLUMINA Eyebrow lift & dark circles

text_copy_copy_copy.text:
BRING LIGHT INTO YOUR GAZE

 

Nothing is more ageing than looking tired all the time - and can even make you feel tired. 

The combination of techniques in DefinisseTM Illumina present the miracle cure you’ve been wishing for. Eyes appear awakened, brighter, more alert and with a renewed sparkle.

The eyebrow arch is enhanced with subtle use of Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads to lift the tissues of the forehead that have succumbed to the passage of time, instantly refreshing your look.

Specially formulated Definisse™ Filler is then gently applied to the tear trough area to correct the loss of volume that causes dark circles. Finally Definisse™ Filler completes the rejuvenation by lifting the cheekbone contour and reducing wrinkles to the side of the eye.

This subtle and discrete use of advanced aesthetics technology makes a real difference to how you look and feel.

item_1723189872839.cq:panelTitle: DEFINISSE™ MUSA Nose, lip & chin shaping

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title: DEFINISSE™ MUSA Nose, lip & chin shaping

text_copy_copy_copy.text:
BE YOUR OWN MUSE

 

As we age, volume and definition can diminish in the features that make up our profile. Cumulatively it can change our appearance and make us feel less like ‘ourselves’. 

Refresh your profile with a clever combination of Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads and Definisse™ Filler - Definisse™ Musa.

Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads are used to gently lift the tip of the nose, creating completely natural and subtle rejuvenation without distorting its shape. 

Definisse™ Filler is then used to enhance the lip volume, the lip contour and the chin, returning the lower face to its prior fullness and beauty. Lips are plumped yet naturally, so as to affirm your natural proportions and most attractive features.

text.text:
1. Wong V. et al. 2017. Hanging by a thread: choosing the right thread for the right patient.
3. Kalyan R. et al. 2017. The Efficacy of Polycaprolactone Threads in Zygomatic and Mandibular Lifting: Consecutive Study from a Single Practitioner’s Experience.
5. Analysis of different types of sutures wires. Rigano Laboratoires S.r.l. PROT 148/17
